headline: Wayne County firefighter who died in the line of duty mourned statewide
author: Bryce Buyakie
sentences: The veteran firefighter died Monday after he and a state trooper were struck by a commercial vehicle while investigating a crash on Interstate 71 just south of the state Route 301 exit near West Salem, according to information from the Highway Patrol.
